ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: I run the shadow knight mailing list
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 23/04/99 04:44:52 GMT Daylight Time, pwolf@ptw.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 23/04/99 04:44:52 GMT Daylight Time, pwolf@... writes:

<< not to be rude myself, but, who has the time to sit and wait for the
general messageboard to come up within its 5-10 minutes?
I know this sounds overexaggerated, but it takes too long, so I do not go
there anymore. >>

Yeah those boards are really, really messy. Although i agree and am sure
there are some good well structured posts and good posters there, ive found
it impossible to find em amongst all the crap.

Just my opinion heh

Jorval
